softwarelist.name: pc98_flop_orig
softwarelist.description: NEC PC-9801 original floppy disk images

software.name: 31iwayu
software.description: 31 - Iwayuru Hitotsu no Chou Lovely na Bouken Katsugeki

info.name: alt_title
info.value: ３１ いわゆるひとつの超らぶりぃな冒険活劇

info.name: alt_title
info.value: アドヴァンスド パワードール２

info.name: usage
info.value: Requires HDD installation. Boot DOS from floppy, insert disk 1 and run INST.EXE.

software.name: agalta2
software.notes: This disk appears to use a custom boot sector that has been modified by Windows 9x, making it non-bootable. It is possible to boot the game by manually running AUTOEXEC.BAT.

software.name: aggres
software.publisher: リバーヒルソフト (Riverhill Soft)
software.notes: Hangs while booting the BASIC interpreter, could be related to the copy protection or the disks being 640 KB double density.

rom.name: ai shimai - futari no kazitsu (1994)(silky's)(disk 1 of 4)(disk a).fdd
ai shimai - futari no kazitsu (1994)(silky's)(disk 2 of 4)(disk b).fdd
ai shimai - futari no kazitsu (1994)(silky's)(disk 3 of 4)(disk c).fdd
ai shimai - futari no kazitsu (1994)(silky's)(disk 4 of 4)(disk d).fdd

software.name: alvaleak
software.notes: boot OK, has disk swap issues (needs to swap multiple times in order to actually make the game to recognize)

info.name: alt_title
info.value: アルヴァリーク冒険記

software.name: amaranth
software.notes: Runs without sound on a PC-9801-86 sound card, works fine with the PC-9801-26K. Sound has been confirmed to work on a real PC-9821Nw150 (PC-9801-118 compatible audio), so it's probably an emulation bug.

software.name: amarant3
software.notes: Most of the text is garbled

software.name: amarankh
software.notes: Doesn't recognize disk A, probably protection related

software.name: ambition
software.notes: Fails to boot with SYSTEM BOOT ERROR

info.name: alt_title
info.value: アンビバレンツ ～二律背反～

software.name: angel
software.publisher: カクテル・ソフト (Cocktail Soft)

software.name: angelarm
software.publisher: フェアリーダスト (Fairy Dust)

info.name: usage
info.value: Run SETUP.EXE to make the system disk bootable or install the game to HDD

software.name: annivers
software.description: Anniversary - Memories of Summer Vacation - Natsuyasumi no Omoide
software.notes: Randomly hangs with stuck note. GRPH key: cycles thru different video modes (Analog, B&W, Digital)

info.name: alt_title
info.value: アニヴァーサリー ～夏休みの想い出～

info.name: usage
info.value: Run SETUP.EXE from DOS. Requires the barcode printed on the back cover as part of the copy protection.

software.name: apros
software.description: Apros - Daichi no Shou - Kaze no Tankyuusha Hen
software.notes: Fails to boot, complaining about the disk being "suspicious" (probably protection related)

info.name: alt_title
info.value: アプロス ～大地の章 風の探求者編～

software.name: arcus
software.notes: Fails to boot and asks for "game disk 0" (probably protection related)

software.name: arcus2
software.notes: Fails to boot with black screen

software.name: arcus3
software.notes: Fails to boot with black screen

software.name: area88i
software.publisher: ファミリーソフト (Family Soft)

info.name: alt_title
info.value: エリア８８ 一角獣の軌跡

software.name: aress
software.description: Aress Ou no Monogatari - The Story of King Aress

software.name: artemis
software.publisher: バーディーソフト (Birdy Soft)

software.name: asgalt
software.publisher: ポニーキャニオン (Pony Canyon)

info.name: alt_title
info.value: アスガルト 惑星ガウナスの内乱

info.name: usage
info.value: Use the SYS command to copy system files to disk 1, then boot from it and create the user disk from the menu. This game uses a custom disk format with 9 sectors per track, so creating the user disk requires an output image format that supports it (e.g. MFI)

info.name: usage
info.value: Run S.BAT to copy DOS files to disk A, then boot from it

info.name: alt_title
info.value: ブランディッシュ リニューアル

info.name: usage
info.value: Use the ディスクＵＴＹ option to create a user disk, then boot from it

software.description: Dennou Gakuen IV - Ape Hunter J
